name: 蘇益生
objective: 本課程涵蓋通訊系統之基本原理，包括：隨機程序、通訊雜訊、類比調變與解調技術、取樣程序、基頻數位調變與解調技術、通道等化技術等。透過此課程，學生可以學習到通訊系統、訊息/數據之傳送與接收等基本觀念，及其他與通訊相關之重要理論。
schedule:
Week 1: Introduction: Communication Systems
Week 2: Signal and Linear System Analysis
Week 3: Linear Modulation Techniques 
Week 4 & 5: Angle Modulation and Multiplexing
Week 6 & 7: Principles of Baseband Digital Data Transmission 
Week 8: Overview of Probability and Random Variables
Week 9: Midterm Exam
Week 10 & 11: Random Signals and Noise
Week 12 & 13: Noise in Modulation Systems
Week 14 & 15: Principles of Digital Data Transmission in Noise
Week 16 & 17: Advanced Data Communications Topics
Week 18: Final Exam

The course schedule is subject to change on the basis of class progress.
scorePolicy:
Midterm Exam: 25% 
Final Exam: 25%
Regular Grade (Attendance+Quizzes): 50%

The grading policy is subject to change.
materials:
Textbook: 
R. E. Ziemer and W. H. Tranter, "Principles of Communications," 7th Ed., Wiley, 2015.

References:
1. S. Haykin and M. Moher, "Communication Systems," 5th Ed., John Wiley & Sons, 2010.
2. S. Haykin and M. Moher, "Introduction to Analog & Digital Communications," 2nd Ed., John Wiley & Sons, 2007.
